pio_attr_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » Pin Input/Output (PIO)

PIO Attribute Data Structure. More...

#include <pio.h>

Detailed Description

This structure defines how the control structure for configuring the PIO port.

Data Fields

pio_sample_t mask
 Each bit set in the mask will be set to mode using I_PIO_SET_PINMODE.
 
u16 mode
 OR the pio_mode_t.
